name: phpmyadmin
author: phpmyadmin
description: Web interface to manage your MySQL/MariaDB databases.

form_fields.label: Database host
form_fields.hint: Database server address (hostname, IP, or Docker container name). Leave empty to enter manually at startup.

form_fields.label: host port
form_fields.hint: Default database port (only used with PMA_HOST). Not needed if using config.user.inc.php for multiple databases with different ports.
